description:
Enjoy this thorough, yet easy to follow Statistics course, that will help you understand and pass your AP Statistics, College Statistics or Intro Elementary Statistics course.

JOIN THE 2000+ HIGH SCHOOL AND COLLEGE STUDENTS I HAVE TAUGHT STATISTICS! I HAVE BUILT THIS COLLEGE CREDIT STATISTICS COURSE INTO AN EASY AND FUN TO FOLLOW UDEMY COURSE.

Three reasons to TAKE THIS COURSE right now!

  1. Get lifetime access to hours of lectures and problems used in high school and college stats courses (with new lectures and additional content/work problems added constantly).
  2. Ask me discussion questions and see me respond to every single one of them thoughtfully!
  3. Learn the fundamentals of statistics and probability starting today. My teaching techniques really help students understand Statistics and how to use and apply the many advanced statistical techniques in the real world.
  4. Study this course so you will PASS your AP Statistics course!

This course is a University of California high school approved course that covers all AP Statistic course topics (the pre-req for this course is Algebra 1). This course focuses on the following topics:

  • Descriptive statistics
  • Probability
  • Random variables
  • Distributions (binomial and normal probability distributions)
  • Sampling
  • Estimation
  • Confidence intervals
  • Hypothesis testing
  • Chi-square distributions
  • Linear correlation and regression

This course is not only great for students, but also for parents to help students pass their stats course!

TAKE A STEP IN THE RIGHT DIRECTION WITH YOUR STATISTICS COURSE AND LEARN HOW TO SOLVE THOSE STATS PROBLEMS WITH EASE! ENROLL NOW!
title: How to Pass AP Statistics, DSST, College Stats & Probability
